item.description:
Santa Barbara Wineries
Just returned from Santa Ynez, Sta. Rita Hills and Santa Maria. I learned much about the area and will share stories, pictures and a couple of wines.

Would you have any Santa Barbara wines to share?

Could you bring an appetizer?

** Due are due **. If you are a regular member, please bring $10 for the yearly dues **
You are considered a regular member if you have attended more than 2 meetings.

The agenda is:
o Greeting wine
o Educational topics
- Santa Ynez, Santa Maria, Sta. Rita Hills
o Tasting
-Same as the education.
o Appetizers
o Mystery Wine
o AWS News
.


Mike

AWS Meetup Group
item.name: The AWS Wine October Meetup
